snippet: STERN--William. February 6, 1934 - February 28, 2016. Beloved of Joanne, Emily, David, Jody, Alan, Rebecca, Jake, Penelope and Max. Services at 11am at Anshe Emeth Memorial Temple, New Brunswick, NJ, March 1, 2016. Shiva through Sunday, March 6th. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STERN--William. February 6, 1934 - February 28, 2016. Beloved of Joanne, Emily, David, Jody, Alan, Rebecca, Jake, Penelope and Max. Services at 11am at Anshe Emeth Memorial Temple, New Brunswick, NJ, March 1, 2016. Shiva through Sunday, March 6th. 1/3
